company_description: We are developing sustainable superabsorbent polymers (SAPs) to replace today‚Äôs synthetic, petroleum-based materials used in hygiene and agriculture. Early traction includes a collaboration LOI with BASF (the world‚Äôs largest chemical company), a Joint Development Agreement in negotiation with Covestro, and testing by leading hygiene brands such as P&G and Essity. Traders keep full control: funds stay in their own exchange accounts, and CashLineAI connects only via trade-only API keys for security and compliance. The platform ensures research‚Üîlive symmetry, so backtests match real execution, and adds risk brakes, audit-ready logs, and dashboards. Funded by Business Finland, the ICDx project aims to develop and validate a novel analytical platform based on immunocomplex (IC) antibody technology. The innovation addresses a growing need for accurate and accessible hormone testing.

Traditional immunoassays used in hormone analytics often suffer from limited sensitivity, cross-reactivity issues, and inconsistent results across platforms. These limitations can lead to unreliable diagnostics, particularly when detecting low hormone concentrations. As health systems move toward precision medicine and personalized care, the demand for more cost-efficient, reproducible, and scalable diagnostic tools is rapidly growing ‚Äî a gap ICDx aims to fill.

The ICDx project builds on advanced immunodiagnostic technologies, based on immunocomplex antibodies.

From an initial dataset of ~16,000 molecules, we discovered 8 patent pending materials that remove 47 contaminants. Our system currently screens 850,000+ candidate molecules from 47,000+ scientific papers, enabling us to predict and synthesize optimized materials 40x faster than traditional trial-and-error R&D. Our materials are 4x more efficient, 2x more cost-effective, and require reapplication only once per year, enabling reliable, lower maintenance solutions across decentralized, remote, and industrial water systems.

Cyclize defossilizes the chemical industry using mixed plastic waste and CO2 as feedstock to produce syngas (a gas mixture of carbon monoxide and hydrogen). FR-PRO is developing a new hardware-based solution that enables wind and solar power plants to provide real physical inertia and fast frequency support. Built on decades of academic research in low-inertia grid stability, the system is currently being validated through simulation and lab testing. Our mission is to become a core enabler of grid-forming renewables, supporting the global shift to stable, 100% clean power systems. company_description:
Billions are spent on cybersecurity every year to protect systems, not systems. Yet 90% of breaches start with people. This is due to a legacy design flaw that merged identity and access, causing people to manage passwords manually‚Äîreusing, sharing, or losing them. Attackers don‚Äôt break in‚Äîthey log in with stolen, phished, or misused credentials.

MyCena fixes the problem at the root. We offer encrypted, segmented, and unphishable access control that removes humans as the attack surface by design. Companies generate and distribute invisible credentials for each system and user, which people never see, store, or type‚Äîeliminating phishing, lateral movement, and privilege escalation. MyCena protects both IT and OT environments, ensures access continuity even during attacks, reduces IT support burdens, and simplifies compliance with full traceability and control. No more resets. No more weak points. Just secure access‚Äîby architecture.

We have developed next generation image-based particle analysis for Life Science research and industry. We target research as well as industry, where the instrument will be a powerful tool for quality control of drug delivery particles or detection of unwanted particles in liquid pharmaceuticals for injection.

company_description:
Wemates introduces an innovative P2P risk-sharing platform, which operates purely as a technical intermediary, adeptly connecting individuals seeking equitable and transparent insurance alternatives.
In essence, we‚Äôre building a P2P risk-sharing network where a group of individuals with mutual interests or similar risk profiles pool their ‚Äúpremiums‚Äù together to insure against a risk. Our platform enables individuals with similar interests to share the risk between themselves, whether based on shared interests, community ties, or specific needs. Often these individuals are somehow connected, e.g. personally (friends), or through mutual business or other common criteria (e.g. possession or similar interests). These groups are then free to define their terms, set coverage limits, and even manage claims. That significantly diverges from traditional insurance
models by community-centric insurance ecosystem, utilizing decentralization and advanced technologies.

Industrial heat requires a 21st century replacement ‚Äì we strongly believe it‚Äôs blue!

Our answer is blue!  Blue light carries particularly much energy and transfers it on impact. By irradiation, we transfer energy directly to the material and nothing but the material, to heat it up beyond 1000 ¬∞C. This results in an efficient and much accelerated process.

IntraPhoton is a deep-tech startup pioneering Eu-doped GaN microLED epitaxial wafers that enable ultra-high-resolution and ultra-bright AR/VR microdisplays. While conventional InGaN and AlGaInP red microLEDs lose efficiency drastically as they shrink, IntraPhoton‚Äôs Eu-doped GaN technology maintains high efficiency and wavelength stability even below 10 ¬µm, thanks to its unique intra-atomic emission mechanism.

This breakthrough allows monolithic RGB integration on a single GaN-based wafer, using the same material system as blue and green LEDs. As a result, it eliminates the need for costly transfer or hybrid assembly processes, significantly improving manufacturability and scalability for full-color microdisplays.

IntraPhoton‚Äôs technology enables AR/VR devices to achieve retina-level resolutions (>60 pixels-per-degree) and brightness over 100,000 nits, unlocking realistic mixed-reality experiences that go beyond current OLED or LCOS limits.

company_description:
Sisusemi solves the 2 major issues in the semiconductor chips: Advanced Nodes Yield and Chip Power Consumption.

As nodes shrink atomic-level surface defects become a critical bottleneck. SisuSemi addresses this foundational issue, enabling faster adoption of advanced nodes with higher yield and reliability.

SisuSemi‚Äôs patented process restores surface integrity, enabling advanced node processing with fewer defects and better downstream compatibility. Our solution uses Ultra High Vacuum (UHV), elevated temperature (< 450 ¬∞C) and controlled oxidation to clean the silicon surface, restore the crystalline structure to the surface atoms and form a very thin crystalline SiO2 layer to protect the silicon surface and enhance further processing.

The technology is based on surface physics research made in University of Turku during the past 15 years. Sisusemi process is enabling technology of smaller components like ALD was 25 years ago.

Smabbler Galaxia is the first hypergraph-based AI system that autonomously transforms massive unstructured data into fully explainable knowledge graphs - enabling AI models to reason, retain context, and provide traceable answers at scale. It operates entirely in-memory on CPUs, processing over 120,000 pages in a single pass without GPUs or complex infrastructure. This allows enterprises in life sciences, finance, compliance, and other regulated sectors to build AI solutions that are not only powerful, but trusted, transparent, and deployment-ready in hours instead of months. company_description: At Polytives, we develop polymeric additives that improve efficiency and sustainability in plastics processing. Unlike conventional additives, our products are polymers themselves, designed to integrate seamlessly into existing materials. By tailoring molecular architecture, we adjust melt viscosity, flow and process windows without affecting stability or mechanical properties. This enables lower energy use, reduced wear and improved processing of recyclates and bio-based compounds. Our platform technology adapts to diverse plastics and applications, offering reliable performance and competitive advantages. Through close collaboration with partners, we translate polymer science into solutions that support circular economy goals and give plastics a viable future.

Qilimanjaro is a quantum computing company based in Barcelona, making quantum useful today. We build full-stack quantum computers based on superconducting fluxonium analog qubits, a novel architecture that bypasses the need for error correction and unlocks faster, more scalable solutions.

Our focus is user-first. Analog quantum systems offer near-term advantages for key problems in simulation, optimization, and AI, where digital (gate-based) quantum systems either fall short or suffer massive qubit overhead.

We follow a dual strategy to democratize access to quantum computing:
-QaaS Platform - Cloud access to our hybrid quantum data center combining analog, digital, and classical computing.
-On-Prem Systems - For HPC centers and research institutions seeking full-stack quantum integration and co-design.

To accelerate adoption, we offer dedicated algorithm support, working alongside users to co-develop high-impact quantum applications and identify where quantum delivers real value.

company_description: We are a studio dedicated to making the best games in the action sports genre.

VerifX is addressing the deepfake challenge by flipping the approach. Instead of chasing what‚Äôs fake, we verify authentic creators and their content at the source. We believe long-term deepfake detection is unsustainable. Any detection algorithm that explains why content is fake can be reverse-engineered to produce even more convincing deepfakes. This creates an endless arms race where detection ultimately fails. VerifX breaks that cycle by focusing on verified authenticity, not fake detection.

By establishing what content is verified, VerifX can scan the internet for fakes. When suspicious content is detected, the creator is instantly notified and, with their approval, we submit a takedown request to the platform hosting it. This enables creators to act quickly, stopping deepfakes before they spread widely and cause greater damage.

With an aging population driving rising stroke incidence, effective intervention is critical. Ischemic strokes, starve the brain of oxygen, risking irreversible damage. Mechanical thrombectomy (MT), using a Stent Retriever (SR) and Distal Access Catheter (DAC), is the gold standard for large vessel occlusions. Current FPR remains suboptimal at 35‚Äì73%, often due to thrombus loss at the DAC‚Äôs cylindrical distal end, leading to fragmentation, emboli in new territories (ENT), prolonged procedures, higher complications, and increased costs. CatMedica achieves > 90 % FPR (in-vitro and in-vivo) improving life quality and reducing costs.

Some of the World's largest problems are invisible to the eye. Air pollution contributes to one in seven deaths. Every day, one factory experiences an explosion and dozens go through a costly production halt because of a false alarm. Three billion tons of food are wasted, and 100 million cubic meters of methane are leaked to the atmosphere. Additionally, people spend time in meeting rooms and schools where the CO2 level can cause human cognition to be halved.

The common denominator is, that current gas sensors are not at the same time reliable and affordable. This leaves people and businesses unaware of critical data. The SGS sensors do not only bridge this gap, but go beyond with reduced power consumption that unlocks IoT use cases, flexibility for wearables and logistics, plus non-toxicity and easy recycling.

Little wonder then, that a dozen companies will pilot with us 2026, including one of the World's 50 largest. We could do plenty of name dropping, but we respect our NDAs.

company_description:
Children‚Äôs feet grow quickly: on average a new shoe size is needed every ~4 months. That‚Äôs costly for families and wasteful for the planet. An even tougher problem is fit: every foot differs (length, width, height), yet the market still sells fixed sizes. It‚Äôs like one helmet size for every head‚Äîuncomfortable, unsafe, far from ideal. 95% of children are born with healthy feet; ~40% of adults develop problems, often linked to ill-fitting childhood shoes.
Sizeless fixes this. We build size-adjustable children‚Äôs shoes that grow with the foot. Our patent-pending mechanism lets parents dial in length and width across multiple sizes per pair‚Äîfewer pairs bought, less material waste, healthier foot development.
Our founding team met at adidas HQ. Sizeless began as a development project with On; we are now backed by Germany‚Äôs EXIST program and develop and source in Europe. Prototypes are being validated with the Institute for Biomechanics & Orthopaedics at the German Sport University Cologne.

Koherent has developed a new long-range radio positioning technology yielding up to a hundred times better precision, still at a very competitive price. By combining radio-interferometric techniques used in radio astronomy with advanced wireless communication methods, our system reliably achieves sub-centimeter precision, even in difficult conditions where other positioning systems struggle.

This breakthrough addresses a critical market gap. Numerous multi-billion-dollar industries require reliable, centimeter-level positioning that current technologies cannot provide. Satellite-based systems like RTK GNSS fail indoors and in urban canyons, while optical solutions are expensive, weather-sensitive, and cumbersome to operate. This lack of a reliable, cost-effective solution holds back the development of automation and other future technologies, a problem our system is built to solve.

Automatic medical papers review.

Our service, Library Med, is similar to Wolfram Alpha, but for biomedicine rather than mathematics. It deconstructs researches into phases and components, each receiving a score from a set of IT and AI tools. The score is based on methodological standards. Better the component adherence to its ideal standard, the better the score.
Finally, the score is justified in detail for every component analyzed. Many papers can be analyzed, compared and automatically aggregated (automatic meta-analysis). This aids doctors and students in swiftly and cheaply accessing robust literature and empowers researchers to enhance their work's empirical rigor, boosting publication prospects. 
It is the first technological step towards the first decentralized scientific publication network.

Quantum science already quietly powers many technologies we rely on daily.

From the MRI machines in hospitals, to the GPS navigation in our phones, the secure encryption protecting our online banking, and even the LED display in the device you are currently reading this on. The issue is that the next generation of quantum applications, and the breakthrough technologies they could enable, remain trapped in specialized facilities due to a fundamental challenge, the optical scaling problem.

There‚Äôs a massive size mismatch; quantum operations happen at microscopic scales, but the optical systems controlling them fill entire rooms.

Phaseshift, with a breakthrough approach to quantum optics that replaces these room-sized optical tables with ultra-thin metasurfaces. Phaseshift‚Äôs technology has the potential to free quantum applications from the constraints of specialized facilities and, as a result, accelerate their real-world implementation.

We solve two of the biggest pain points in IoT:

First: hardware dependency. Tools like Zephyr help a bit, but in the end you‚Äôre still stuck managing countless binaries for every board, because true binary compatibility just isn‚Äôt there.

Second: resilience. Stripped-down versions of Kubernetes try to address this, but Kubernetes was built for stateless cloud apps‚Äîand it fundamentally breaks down when you run stateful systems at the edge.

That‚Äôs exactly why we built Peeriot. Our open-source runtime Myrmic acts as a universal software adapter, delivering real binary portability. At the same time, it‚Äôs an intelligent swarm: if one device fails, others seamlessly take over its tasks and state.

In short, we give developers the architecture they‚Äôve always needed‚Äîso they can focus on building great features instead of wrestling with infrastructure.

KC8 has a patented suite of capture processes utilising potassium carbonate solvents. The UNO processes, specifically the UNO MK 3 process, uses a precipitating form of the technology. These processes are at the heart of KC8 Capture Technologies and provide both major capital and operating cost reductions, making it the superior capture process. 
- Low overall cost (up to 50% less than the best amines)
- Lower energy use (up to 15% less than the best amine based technology)
- Multi-impurity capture and production of valuable by-products (no degradation of products)
- Low energy of regeneration <2.5 GJ/T CO2
- Low volatility and environmental impact (SOx and NOx converted to fertiliser products)
- Solvent sourced within current global Potassium market (readily available)

Conventional epoxy resins are a major bottleneck in the ‚Ç¨40B global epoxy industry, forcing manufacturers into slow, energy-intensive thermal curing that generates significant waste.

SpeedPox has reinvented the chemistry. Our patented, true one-component (1K) epoxy system cures on-demand in seconds via a UV or heat impulse, eliminating mixing, waste, and harmful substances. Our unique "curing wave" technology overcomes the fundamental limits of light penetration, enabling full polymerization even in shadowed and opaque materials‚Äîa feat unattainable by competitors.

This breakthrough slashes production times by up to 99%, cuts energy costs by over 98%, and simplifies supply chains. We have validated our technology with global leaders in automotive, medical, and flexible electronics. We are scaling via a capital-efficient licensing model to disrupt the Asian electronics market first.

xQ challenges the core assumption of the field: that you need qubits to get quantum-class results. We‚Äôve found a software path. Instead of building fragile quantum hardware, xQ compiles quantum circuits into physics-grounded dynamical systems and solves them numerically on commodity GPUs. The outcome is quantum-scale behavior with reproducible outputs and predictable cost‚Äîno qubits required. This isn‚Äôt brute force; it exploits structure in the landscape, following gradients rather than enumerating possibilities. Near-term focus: 1,000-qubit effective-scale demonstrators on recognized benchmarks in cryptanalysis, combinatorial optimization, materials/chemistry, and next-gen AI‚Äîproblems long considered intractable.

ChangeRadar helps organizations regain control over evergreen cloud environments by detecting, analyzing, and documenting risks introduced by automatic updates from cloud providers. With thousands of changes deployed annually across platforms like Microsoft 365, Azure, and other SaaS/PaaS systems, each update carries the potential to disrupt architecture, leak data, shift access privileges, or violate compliance rules.

Our AI-native risk engine continuously monitors cloud service changes, filters out noise, and highlights only the high-impact events that could compromise security, stability, or regulation. We generate actionable insights and audit-ready documentation, enabling IT, security and compliance teams to make informed decisions, mitigate exposure, and maintain operational resilience.
